title: Merge duplicate Debug|Win32 ItemDefinitionGroup in libHarfBuzzSharp.vcxproj
body:
Addresses review feedback on #3404 to eliminate duplicate `ItemDefinitionGroup` sections for the `Debug|Win32` configuration.

## Changes
- Consolidated two identical `ItemDefinitionGroup` blocks with condition `'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='Debug|Win32'`
- Retained `BufferSecurityCheck` setting from the second block in the merged section
- Removed 18 lines of duplicate XML configuration

The vcxproj now has a single `Debug|Win32` configuration block that includes both `ObjectFileName` and `BufferSecurityCheck` properties.
